description:
JOIN 230+ STUDENTS TO LEARN BASIC KINETIC TYPOGRAPHY ANIMATIONS AND JUMP INTO THE VIDEO EDITING INDUSTRY!

Use PowerPoint as Your video editing software and start making beautiful kinetic typography videos that will make the message You have to share with Your audience much more entertaining to watch.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This Design Course Will Teach You How To Make Kinetic Typography Videos in PowerPoint!

  • You will enhance your graphic design skills
  • You will use rarely known PPT techniques
  • Synchronize a voice over to a animation
  • Learn to make custom transitions between slides
  • It will take you less than 1h to complete!

Powerpoint allows to export presentations to video, so you can create promo videos, animation sequences, content for YouTube, a clip for a music video and get creative the way you always wanted and powerpoint will be your guide - all with help of this detailed walkthrough on how to make kinetic typography videos using only PowerPoint! I will take you by hand and start with a empty presentation file until we have a ready to export finished animation sequence.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are THREE pillars on which this course is standing:

  1. Give you high quality videos,
  2. Share valuable tips & tricks rare to be known for regular Powerpoint users,
  3. Be entertaining to watch.

I want to make sure that after taking this class you not only have spent time on it but really did obtain a new skill which will help you produce high quality animations with PowerPoint.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I prepared a short assignment for every participant, to make a animation along with me, even if it will be a very short one (4 words) so you learn by doing and real powerpoint usage. Afterwards we can discuss and share feedback on it inside of the discussion boards!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I hope you will enjoy the course and feel free to enroll if you feed that this course may be beneficial for you! Don't wait to sign up. ENROLL NOW!
title: Kinetic Typography in PowerPoint 2013 Animate in Powerpoint
